description:
Yabu Sukeharu is an engineer serving in the Yamato`s engineering department. His is rank: Petty Officer 1st Class. He is a native of Mie Prefecture.
The favorite student of Tokugawa. Served under him on the Kirishima before boarding the Yamato. His ability as an engineer is first-class, but he is somewhat timid and always skeptical.
name: Yabu Sukeji
